home.title: Send encrypted files and emails
home.par: Encrypt and send files, download the PostGuard add-on for your mail client, or decrypt encrypted mails.

about.title: About PostGuard
about.team.par: iHub at Radboud University PostGuard is being developed by a multidisciplinary team from , in the Netherlands, funded by NWO. The aim is to foster secure communication by offering free email encryption based on advanced (identity-based) encryption techniques. The team focuses on usability and accessibility of encryption technology by combing expertise in computing science, security, and user experience design. This project partners with several public and private organisations in the Netherlands, including Nedap Healthcare, VGZ, SURFnet, the Municipality of Nijmegen and Compumatica.
